articles.author: Sudeshna Ghoshal
articles.title: Australia doubles student visa fees, mandates offshore applications; likely to impact Indians | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Australia has doubled student visa fees to AUD 1,600 and mandated offshore applications starting July 1, 2024, impacting Indian and Chinese students. Changes also affect temporary graduates, who must seek employer-sponsored visas or leave upon visa expiry
articles.content: The Australian government has doubled the visa application fees for international students from AUD 710 ($473) to AUD 1,600 ($1,068), which is approximately 89,130.29 Indian Rupees, effective July 1,… [+3124 chars]
